facebook/zstd.summary: Recent activities in the zstd repository include a push event and a pull request event, both of which aim to clarify documentation for Frame-level methods invoked on a skippable frame, with discussions and fixes related to issue #4226 and pull request #4227.

facebook/react-native-website.summary: The react-native-website repository saw a push event and a pull request event focused on fixing typos in the Fabric Native Components Introduction, as detailed in issue #4408, demonstrating ongoing efforts to refine and polish the documentation.

facebook/docusaurus.summary: In the docusaurus repository, a significant pull request event was initiated, adding support for Bun by enabling the passing of 'bun' to the npm-to-yarn converter, with thorough documentation of the change, including a test plan and links to relevant deploy previews, enhancing the platform's compatibility and functionality.
